description: [``botocore``] Doc only update for CloudFormation that fixes several customer-reported issues.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for providing a custom timeout value for finding a scaling point during autoscaling in Aurora Serverless v1.
[``botocore``] This release updates terminology around KMS keys.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for "Lifecycle Configurations" to SageMaker Studio
[``botocore``] This release adds an API option for startTranscriptionJob and startMedicalTranscriptionJob that allows the user to specify encryption context key value pairs for batch jobs.
[``botocore``] Add new data source type for Amazon OpenSearch (successor to Amazon ElasticSearch).
